channel.title: Ravi Teja Gangineni
channel.description: Ravi Teja Gangineni is a full stack developer having experience on Frontend Development with Javascript, Jquery, Angular Js. Backend Development with PHP Frameworks like Slim (REST Micro Framework), Laravel, Magento, Wordpress Etc.,

item.title: Entry to IT-BHU(Currently IIT(BHU) Varanasi)
item.description: 21st July 2008 My entry to IT-BHU to study Integrated Dual Degree in Pharmaceutics. First time i was out of my state and landed into a feeling of complex new environment. Even though i was able to understand hindi, but when i spoke hindi with obvious mistakes environment sometimes filled with humour or anger in the opposite person. Coming to english Speaking... I was good in english but not fluent enough and it was unavoidable thing that i can't speak english with gatekeepers and autorickshaw pullers.

item.title: coming from work
item.description: 21st July 2008 My entry to IT-BHU to study Integrated Dual Degree in Pharmaceutics. First time i was out of my state and landed into a feeling of complex new environment. Even though i was able to understand hindi, but when i spoke hindi with obvious mistakes environment sometimes filled with humour or anger in the opposite person. Coming to english Speaking... I was good in english but not fluent enough and it was unavoidable thing that i can't speak english with gatekeepers and autorickshaw pullers.
